prompts.description:
Generate a code review prompt.

    Args:
        code: Code to review
        language: Programming language
prompts.name: code_review
prompts.title: Code Review

raw:
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1,"result":{"prompts":[{"name":"code_review","title":"Code Review","description":"
    Generate a code review prompt.

    Args:
        code: Code to review
        language: Programming language
    ","arguments":[{"name":"code","required":true},{"name":"language","required":false}]}]}}

result.description:
Generate a code review prompt.

    Args:
        code: Code to review
        language: Programming language

content.text:
Please review this python code and provide feedback on:

1. Code quality and style
2. Potential bugs or issues
3. Performance considerations
4. Security concerns
5. Suggestions for improvement

```python
def hello():
    print('Hello, World!')
```

Please provide specific, actionable feedback.

raw:
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":2,"result":{"description":"
    Generate a code review prompt.

    Args:
        code: Code to review
        language: Programming language
    ","messages":[{"role":"user","content":{"type":"text","text":"Please review this python code and provide feedback on:

1. Code quality and style
2. Potential bugs or issues
3. Performance considerations
4. Security concerns
5. Suggestions for improvement

```python
def hello():
    print('Hello, World!')
```

Please provide specific, actionable feedback."}}]}}

resources.description: Current server status and health information.
resources.name: server_status

error.message: Error creating resource from template: Error creating resource from template: Unknown log file: nonexistent.txt

raw: {"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":5,"error":{"code":0,"message":"Error creating resource from template: Error creating resource from template: Unknown log file: nonexistent.txt"}}

tools.description:
Get current weather information for a city.

    Args:
        city: Name of the city
        units: Temperature units (metric, imperial, or kelvin)

    Returns:
        Weather information or error message
tools.name: get_weather

tools.description:
Process a list of data items with progress reporting.

    Args:
        data: List of data items to process
        operation: Type of operation (uppercase, lowercase, reverse)
        ctx: MCP context for progress reporting

    Returns:
        Processed data results
tools.name: process_data_with_progress

raw:
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":6,"result":{"tools":[{"name":"get_weather","description":"
    Get current weather information for a city.

    Args:
        city: Name of the city
        units: Temperature units (metric, imperial, or kelvin)

    Returns:
        Weather information or error message
    ","inputSchema":{"properties":{"city":{"title":"City","type":"string"},"units":{"default":"metric","title":"Units","type":"string"}},"required":["city"],"title":"get_weatherArguments","type":"object"},"outputSchema":{"properties":{"result":{"title":"Result","type":"string"}},"required":["result"],"title":"get_weatherOutput","type":"object"}},{"name":"process_data_with_progress","description":"
    Process a list of data items with progress reporting.

    Args:
        data: List of data items to process
        operation: Type of operation (uppercase, lowercase, reverse)
        ctx: MCP context for progress reporting

    Returns:
        Processed data results
    ","inputSchema":{"properties":{"data":{"items":{"type":"string"},"title":"Data","type":"array"},"operation":{"title":"Operation","type":"string"}},"required":["data","operation"],"title":"process_data_with_progressArguments","type":"object"},"outputSchema":{"properties":{"result":{"title":"Result","type":"string"}},"required":["result"],"title":"process_data_with_progressOutput","type":"object"}}]}}
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":7,"result":{"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Weather in New York: 20°C"}],"structuredContent":{"result":"Weather in New York: 20°C"},"isError":false}}
